sn12.63:2.7: pariyādiṇṇā → pariyādinnā (bj, sya-all, km); pariyādānaṁ (pts1ed, pts2ed)
sn12.63:2.8: anittiṇṇo → anitthiṇṇo (sya-all, km); anithiṇṇo (pts1ed, pts2ed); anatiṇṇo (mr)
sn12.63:4.2: kuṭṭañce → kuḍḍañce (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
sn12.63:4.6: nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye tannissitā → nissāya tiṭṭheyya ye tannissitā tannissitā (bj, pts1ed-2), nissāya tiṭṭheyya ye taṁ nissitā taṁ nissitā (sya-all, km)
